Content: Production plants like shipyards or factories, should be able to
specialize on a certain blueprint, earning benefits. This
specialization may refer to the blueprint familiy (so only variants can
be produced) or a specific model (so only this specific blueprint may
be produced). This specialization takes time (and ressources) to
create, change or undo. This simulates changes to the tooling and
forces the player to make decisions regarding to specialization of
